divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and 3 others were smoking cigs after an AA mtg in the alleyway of our meeting hall when abrubtly a large orange fireball shot up into the sky.The fireball then remained stationary at about 45% looking westward. The fireball hovered and wobbled in place for about 30 seconds. The intensity was still very bright orange while it hovered in place.The object then started to slowly ascend and at the same time it's brightness decreased as it proceeded upwards until it just faded into an imperceptable point of light.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Fairfield
There were no other sightings in Fairfield on or around December 24th 2011
Summary: bright orange fireball shot up from horizon in the west,hovered then slowly ascended into space?
